actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to utilize the repayment of delinquent foreign debts for the establishment of the National Outdoor Recreation and Wilderness Trust Fund to be used to acquire land and waters for national outdoor recreation and wilderness areas.
short_title: National Outdoor Recreation and Wilderness Trust Fund Act

summary.text: National Outdoor Recreation and Wilderness Trust Fund Act - Provides that the repayment of delinquent foreign debts, shall be used for the establishment of the National Outdoor Recreation and Wilderness Trust Fund to be used by the Secretary of the Interior to acquire land and waters for national outdoor recreation and wilderness areas.

titles.title: National Outdoor Recreation and Wilderness Trust Fund Act

A bill to utilize the repayment of delinquent foreign debts for the establishment of the National Outdoor Recreation and Wilderness Trust Fund to be used to acquire land and waters for national outdoor recreation and wilderness areas.
